**Context**:
The main orchestrator (`src/main.py`) runs multiple agents in sequence every 15 minutes. This task will optimize performance by:
- Running independent agents in parallel
- Adding retry logic for API failures
- Monitoring agent performance
- Implementing health checks
- Integrating new risk management system

**Expected Improvements**:
- 50%+ reduction in total run time (parallel execution)
- Better reliability (graceful degradation)
- Real-time monitoring (execution times, errors, health)
- Integration with risk agent and backtesting framework

**Deliverables**:
- Optimized main.py with parallel execution
- Agent profiling and monitoring module
- Health check system
- Execution dashboard
- Documentation and usage guide

**Impact**:
- Faster agent loop (more frequent updates)
- Better system reliability
- Real-time performance visibility
- Production-ready orchestration
